abhayarāja：abhayarāja（pu）
အဘယရာဇ（ပု）
[abhaya+rāja]
[အဘယ+ရာဇ]

Abhayarāja：A building erected by King Vijayabāhu IV. in connection with the Vanaggāmapāsāda Vihāra.

He built it in order that he might give the merits arising there from to his father，Parakkamabāhu II. It was richly endowed （Cv.lxxxviii.51-2； Cv. trans. ii.186，n.4）.

abhayarāja：＂အဘယရာဇ（ပု）
[အဘယ+ရာဇ]
အဘယမင်း။ အဘယ-（၂，၂-ခ）-လည်းကြည့်။
